name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】SUPER SPECIAL SUMMER BIRTHDAY LIVE! #KiaraBDay2025 [f-UbyQUUykE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Feeling Gradation' (フィーリングラデーション).
MC section where the guests congratulate Kiara on her birthday and introduce themselves in English.

subtitles.original: Lalaink wa balailo
subtitles.english: Lalaink wa balailo

subtitles.original: どれだけ上手く見せようとしても
subtitles.english: No matter how well I try to act

subtitles.original: 君がいなければ何の意味もない
subtitles.english: It means nothing without you

subtitles.original: かすり傷すらつかない幻想
subtitles.english: An illusion without even a scratch

subtitles.original: 針の落ちないレコードさ
subtitles.english: Like a record whose needle won't drop

subtitles.original: たった今 留め処ない追い風背にして
subtitles.english: Right now, with an endless tailwind at my back

subtitles.original: Come as flow
subtitles.english: Come as flow

subtitles.original: 吹き荒れる向かい風にも心 なびかせて
subtitles.english: Letting my heart flutter even in the raging headwind

subtitles.original: 飛び乗って to the future
subtitles.english: Jump on into the future

subtitles.original: ライン引いたって Are We Start Line?
subtitles.english: Even if we draw a line, are we at the start line?

subtitles.original: ときめいてしまえば
subtitles.english: If our hearts start to throb

subtitles.original: 瞬く間に広がる開放
subtitles.english: Liberation spreads in the blink of an eye

subtitles.original: 一挙手一投足すべてがドラマ
subtitles.english: Every move and every gesture is a drama

subtitles.original:
待ちわびたデーブレイク Are We Start Line?
代わる代わる彩るパノラマ
満ち溢れる フィーリングラデーション

The long-awaited daybreak, are we at the start line?

subtitles.english: The time for the beginning has come

subtitles.original: Nothing is impossible
subtitles.english: Nothing is impossible

subtitles.english: The world ahead that no one knows yet

subtitles.english: Just being in a daze is tasteless

subtitles.english: An emotional situation

subtitles.english: Let's see how far we can go

subtitles.english: There's no other choice, get a whole new way

subtitles.english: Let's raise our voices together

subtitles.original: 伴っても
subtitles.english: ...accompanies it

subtitles.original: Kiara-senpai, Happy Birthday!
subtitles.english: Kiara-senpai, Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original:
Thank you, thank you! Well, all you wished me happy birthday,
but since we went to Austria together...
subtitles.english:
Thank you, thank you! Well, all you wished me happy birthday,
but since we went to Austria together...

subtitles.original: ...can you say it in German? Happy Birthday?
subtitles.english: ...can you say it in German? Happy Birthday?

subtitles.original: Sure! Sure, sure! Oh, German!
subtitles.english: Sure! Sure, sure! Oh, German!

subtitles.original: Okay, I teach you, I teach you. Oh, you don't know, right?
subtitles.english: Okay, I teach you, I teach you. Oh, you don't know, right?

subtitles.original: I don't know, sorry.
subtitles.english: I don't know, sorry.

subtitles.original: 教えてくれるんだ、よかった。
subtitles.english: You're gonna teach us? Great.

subtitles.original: Yeah. It's "Alles Gute..."
subtitles.english: Yeah. It's "Alles Gute..."

subtitles.original: Alles Gute!
subtitles.english: Alles Gute!

subtitles.original: Gute? Gute!
subtitles.english: Gute? Gute!

subtitles.original: Alles Gute! Alles Gute!
subtitles.english: Alles Gute! Alles Gute!

subtitles.original: Zum... Geburtstag!
subtitles.english: Zum... Geburtstag!

subtitles.original: Geburtstag! Oh! Perfect! Okay!
subtitles.english: Geburtstag! Oh! Perfect! Okay!

subtitles.original:
せーの！
Alles Gute zum Geburtstag!
subtitles.english:
Ready, set...
Alles Gute zum Geburtstag!

subtitles.original: Yay! 嬉しい！もはやドイツかオーストリア人。やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay! I'm happy! You're basically German or Austrian now. We did it!

subtitles.original: Thank you! Super danke! Super danke! Super danke!
subtitles.english: Thank you! Thanks a lot! Thanks a lot! Thanks a lot!

subtitles.original: Okay! Self-introduction in English! Okay! From who?
subtitles.english: Okay! Self-introduction in English! Okay! From who?

subtitles.original: Ririka!
subtitles.english: Ririka!
